title: The Recipe Alice Waters Can't Live Without
description:
Referenced in this episode:

  • The One Recipe Alice Waters Can't Live Without
  • Cardamom Cake from Niloufer Ichaporia King

Genius-Hunter Extra Credit:

  • Alice Waters names Niloufer's cake the one recipe she can't live without (The Guardian)
  • Check out those not-dry turkey burgers

Special thanks to listeners Numra (@empressmarket), Vlada (@mat.vlada), and Nilufar (@kayhanikitchen) for sharing your favorite cardamom-centric recipes!

Is there a recipe that's stayed with you throughout your life? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore, Niloufer Ichaporia King)

itunes:title: The Recipe Alice Waters Can't Live Without
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Niloufer Ichaporia King
itunes:summary: Cookbook author Niloufer Ichaporia King tells Kristen about the beguiling, modular cardamom cake she encountered at backyard wedding 40 years ago and has since modified into the one recipe Alice Waters says she can't live without.
itunes:subtitle: Cookbook author Niloufer Ichaporia King tells Kristen about the beguiling, modular cardamom cake she encountered at backyard wedding 40 years ago and has since modified into the one recipe Alice Waters says she can't live without.
itunes:keywords: niloufer ichaporia king, cake recipe, cardamom recipes, berkeley, cardamom cake, parsi recipes, alice waters, chez panisse, kristen miglore
